summary: Completed UI/UX redesign verification for 'Midnight Architect' theme. All pages display correctly with gold (#d4af37) CTA buttons, sharp edges (rounded-none), obsidian (#050505) background, and acid green (#a3e635) accents. Navigation between pages works correctly.
passed_tests: Landing page loads with Midnight Architect theme
Landing page: Gold CTA buttons (GET STARTED, ANALYZE YOUR FIRST EMAIL)
Landing page: Sharp edges (rounded-none) on all buttons
Landing page: Obsidian background (#050505)
Landing page: Serif headings with gold 'Perfected.' text
Landing page: Stats section with tetris-style cards (85%, 3x, 10k+)
Landing page: Features section visible
Login page: Split layout design with form on left, visual on right
Login page: Gold SIGN IN button with sharp edges
Login page: Underline-style inputs (brutalist design)
Login page: All form elements have data-testid attributes
Signup page: Split layout with visual on left, form on right
Signup page: Gold CREATE ACCOUNT button with sharp edges
Signup page: Password validation indicators
Signup page: All form elements have data-testid attributes
Pricing page: 4 plan cards (Free, Starter, Pro, Agency)
Pricing page: Gold GO PRO button on Pro plan
Pricing page: Popular badge on Pro plan
Pricing page: Monthly/Annual toggle with SAVE 20% badge
Pricing page: Acid green checkmarks for features
Navigation: Landing → Login works
Navigation: Login → Signup works
Navigation: Signup → Login works
Navigation: Login → Landing (Back) works
Navigation: Landing → Pricing works
Navigation: Pricing → Signup (Get Started) works
Backend: /api/health returns healthy
Backend: /api/billing/prices returns all plans with 20% annual discount
critical_code_review_comments: All pages correctly implement the Midnight Architect theme
data-testid attributes properly added to all interactive elements
Sharp edges (rounded-none) consistently applied across all buttons
Color scheme correctly uses gold (#d4af37), acid green (#a3e635), and obsidian (#050505)
context_for_next_testing_agent: UI redesign with Midnight Architect theme verified. All pages (Landing, Login, Signup, Pricing) display correctly with gold buttons, sharp edges, and dark theme. Navigation between pages works. Backend APIs healthy.
